cast.name: 安东尼·德科内 Antoine de Caunes

this_title: L'Homme à la tête de kraft
introduction: Antoine and Emma are on the way to a festival. All of a sudden, a man with a kraft bag on his head blocks their way. Antoine breaks abrubptly, spins the wheel and sends the car straight into an apple tree. When they come round, Emma realises that she is now inside her father's body and vice versa.
chinese_title: L'Homme à la tête de kraft
